com.konakart.blif
Interface OrderTotalMgrIf

All Known Implementing Classes:
OrderTotalMgr
public interface OrderTotalMgrIf

OrderTotalMgrIf Interface which an implementation of this manager must adhere to.

getOrderTotalModuleForName

OrderTotalInterface getOrderTotalModuleForName(java.lang.String moduleName)
                                               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                                      java.lang.InstantiationException,
                                                      java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                                      java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException,
                                                      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
Called to instantiate a orderTotal module. It determines whether the module has a constructor where KKEng is passed in and if it does, then this constructor is used. Otherwise the empty constructor is used.

Parameters:
moduleName -
Returns:
Returns an instantiated OrderTotal Module
